name: InTWINSic
description:
The Emmerson twins, Jules and Vern, were captured four years ago by the government of Bromenistan and have endured experiment after experiment to strengthen the bonds of twins and forge special covert operatives. But after all these years, Jules and Vern have had enough. Jules, having stolen and stashed the key to her cell under her pillow plans with her brother to escape this facility once and for all.

Take control of BOTH Emmerson twins at one time to solve puzzles only two minds combined could hope to decrypt and finally give them a taste of freedom.

Made within 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021
